outline:
1. time
    1. time (of an event)
    2. time (usual)
    3. experiences, fortunes
    4. occurrence, occasion
kjv_def: [phrase] after, (al-) ways, [idiom] certain, [phrase] continually, [phrase] evening, long, (due) season, so (long) as, (even-, evening-, noon-) tide, (meal-), what) time, when.
strongs_def: time, especially (adverb with preposition) now, when, etc.
